text:
그리고 순식간에 눈 뜨고 데이트 상대 빼앗긴 매튜. 으아앙, 소리 내면서 소파에 늘어지는데 옆에 있던 하오가 어깨 토닥여줌. 괜찮다고 말하면서 웃는데 그게 오히려 더 안 괜찮아 보여요ㅠ대문자 F 김규빈 그 와중에 진심으로 매튜님 어떡해.. 이러고 있을 듯. 한유진 그런 김규빈 쪽에 시선 자꾸 줄 거 같음.
매튜: 사람이 여섯명이잖아요. 근데 왜 나한테 이런 일이...? 진짜, 진짜, 기대했거든요. 태래님이랑 데이트하는 거. 그래서 실망이 더 컸던 거 같아요.
"아 나 집에 가야겠다."
"아냐. 아냐. 집에 왜 가."
그 와중에 집에 왜 가냐는 김지웅. 데이트 불발 된 태래, 자기 탓은 아니지만 뭔가 괜히 미안해서 자기가 팥빙수 사다주겠다고 함.
"팥빙수 몇 개. 한 박스 사와?"
"한박스 사야겠다."
차례로 지웅이랑 규빈. 유진이 소파에 걸어뒀던 자기 자켓 챙기는데 시선은 자꾸 규빈한테 향하지. 근데 김규빈은 몰라. 자기가 안 걸려서 다행이랑 생각과 매튜 어떡함. 이 생각 뿐임. 지금 규빈이는 매튜를 동생으로 보고 있기 때문에 더 안쓰러워하는 중일 듯. 그런 와중에 그 옆에서 입꼬리 못 숨기고 아 좀 어색하네, 하고 소파에서 일어나는 김지웅. 어색한 거 치곤 상당히 표정이 밝은 편임.
지웅: 이런 말하면 좀 나쁜 놈 같기는 한데, 저한테는 되게 최상의 시나리오였어요. 매튜님이 남은 게. 어쨌든 나도 못해본 데이트를 다른 사람이랑 할 뻔 했던 거였잖아요. 또 그 사람은 호감이라고 했고. 나쁜 거지만 저한테는 다행인, 그런 거였습니다.
trans:
And in an instant, Matthew woke up and lost his date. He was making noise while lounging on the sofa, and Hao, sitting next to him, patted his shoulder. Hao said it was okay and laughed, but Matthew could tell it wasn’t really okay. Capital F In the meantime, Kim Kyubin would be like, "What should I do, Matthew? I think Han Yujin will keep staring at Kim Kyubin.
Matthew: There are six people, right? So why is this happening to me...? Seriously, I was really looking forward to going on a date with Tae-rae. I think that's why I’m even more disappointed.
"Ah, I need to head home."
"No, no. Why are you leaving?"
In the meantime, Kim Ji-woong asked why he was going home. Tae-rae, whose date had fallen through, wasn't at fault but still felt a bit guilty, so he offered to buy some patbingsu to make up for it.
"How many patbingsus am I buying? A whole box?"
"A box sounds good."
Ji-woong and Gyu-bin are both present. Yu-jin, grabbing the jacket she had draped over the sofa, keeps glancing at Gyu-bin, but he doesn't notice. He probably feels lucky he hasn't been caught yet, but he's also wondering what to do about Matthew. Gyu-bin likely feels even more sorry for Matthew, seeing him as a younger brother. Meanwhile, Kim Ji-woong stands up from the sofa, thinking, "Oh, this is a bit awkward." He seems oddly cheerful when it comes to handling awkward situations.
Ji-woong: I know it sounds a bit jerk-ish to say this, but what Matthew ended up with was actually the best scenario for me. He almost had a date I’ve never had. She even called him 'likable.' It was unfortunate for him, but luckily, it worked out for me.
